name: Rocket Roses
description:
Your Goal -

  • Push your planet away from the Sun by planting the rocket roses!
  • Legend has it, the moon may be summoned to block the Suns advance if enough of them are planted.
  • Defend yourself and your plants from the fire monsters with your trusty water gun. Don't forget to also plant Cacti to help as well!

Controls To Play -

  • WASD move
  • Hold left-shift to run
  • Left and right arrows turn
  • Space bar fires water gun
  • `E` interacts with plants for purchase and placing. Also interacts with filling water gun from melting ice.

Troubleshooting -

  • If you have trouble starting the game, please reload the page. Click Run Game, then press `Enter` on the title screen before doing anything else.
